Milo went into exile, and on April 9 sentence was given against him in the new court for trying cases of bribery (de ambitu) which was established by Pompey's statute. A little later he was pro- nounced guilty in the court for punishing illegal organisations (dc sodaliciis), and again in the court which dealt with violence under the ordinary law (de vt).
